techQuotes.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
The human spirit must prevail over technology.
Innovation is the outcome of a habit, not a random act.
The great myth of our times is that technology is communication.
Technology will never replace great teachers, but technology in the hands of great teachers is transformational.
The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art.
We are changing the world with technology.
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it.
Technology and business are becoming inextricably interwoven.
It’s not a faith in technology. It’s faith in people.
Our technology forces us to live mythically.
The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
What new technology does is create new opportunities to do a job that customers want done.
Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
The most technologically efficient machine that man has ever invented is the book.
Technology feeds on itself. Technology makes more technology possible.
Technology has forever changed the world we live in.
Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.
The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
Technology is nothing. What’s important is that you have a faith in people.
Technology is teaching us to be human again.
Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
It’s not that we use technology, we live technology.
Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.
I think it's fair to say that personal computers have become the most empowering tool we've ever created.
The pace of technological progress in this century is incomparably faster than in the past.
First we thought the PC was a calculator. Then we found out how to turn numbers into letters with ASCII—and we thought it was a typewriter.
One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
Technology is anything that wasn’t around when you were born.
Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
We always overestimate the change that will occur in the next two years and underestimate the change that will occur in the next ten.
What the Internet is doing is giving rise to new forms of crime that we wouldn’t have had in the past.
It’s supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button.
The only thing more expensive than software is bad software.
Technology is an enabler, not a driver.
Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
If you think technology can solve your problems, then you don't understand the technology and you don't understand your problems.
The most dangerous kind of waste is the waste we do not recognize.
Let’s go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
Technology is a word that describes something that doesn’t work yet.
The next big thing is the one that makes the last big thing usable.
It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
Be nice to nerds. Chances are you’ll end up working for one.
It’s supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button.
The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.
Everything is designed. Few things are designed well.
Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
Just because something doesn’t do what you planned it to do doesn’t mean it’s useless.
Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
The road to success is always under construction.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
Whether you think you can or think you can’t, you’re right.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
Success is what happens after you have survived all of your mistakes.
If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Dream big and dare to fail.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
You don’t need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
